  • Method Details

    • check

      SolverStatus check()
      Check if the currently added expressions are satisfiable.
      Returns:
      Status

    • push

      void push()
      Push the current solver state. When calling pop(), all expressions added after the last push will be removed.

    • pop

      void pop(int n)
      Remove expressions added after the previous n push() calls.
      Parameters:
      n -

      Remove expressions added after the previous push() call.

      Get the current status of the solver.
      Returns:
      Status

    • getModel

      Valuation getModel()
      Get the satisfying assignment for the currently added expressions. Should only be called if check() was already called and the result is SAT.
      Returns:
      Satisfying assignment

      Collection<Expr<BoolType>> getAssertions()
